sn35.140:3.1: 140. Ajjhattaaniccahetusutta
sn35.140:4.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn35.140:4.3: Aniccasambhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto niccaṃ bhavissati … pe …
sn35.140:4.5: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo jivhāya uppādāya sopi anicco.
sn35.140:4.6: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, jivhā kuto niccā bhavissati … pe …
sn35.140:4.8: Yopi, bhikkhave, hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn35.140:4.9: Aniccasambhūto, bhikkhave, mano kuto nicco bhavissati.
sn35.140:4.10: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati … pe …
sn35.140:4.15: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
